name: TSG_m4n1k67 (Founder)
desc: TSG_m4n1k67 is the founder of TSG and enjoys playing any game he can squad up with fellow members, like; Destiny 2, Apex, BFV, COD: Modern Warfare, Warzone, Realm, and the like.

name: TSG_Bionic (Co-Founder)
desc: TSG_Bionic is the co-founder of TSG and is extremely talented in ALL FPS games. He enjoys playing COD: Modern Warfare, Warzone, Realm, BFV, and other games like them.

name: Beastkiller500 (Co-Founder)
desc: Beastkiller500 is another co-founder of TSG and loves squading up and clapping cheeks. He loves playing most FPSs including...COD: Modern Warfare, Warzone, BFV, Apex and the like.

name: Bulldawg_Ross
desc: Bulldawg_Ross is an energetic and positive light in our community and he loves to play pretty much anything but in particular here's a few games he enjoys; Dauntless, Realm, COD: Modern Warfare, as well as some smaller titles

name: ItsSoggyPants
desc: ItsSoggyPants is a, and I quote, 'Big stupid fucking badass' that loves to play WoW, Minecraft, Conan Exiles, Destiny 2, Diablo 3, and the list goes on

name: DeluxeBiscuit
desc: DeluxeBiscuit gives god-level tier gameplay to BFV. He also plays popular titles like Apex Legends as well. Go check out this legend himself

name: Runeworks_Gaming
desc: Runeworks_Gaming is a variety streamer and loves playing much smaller titles as well as well-known titles like Borderlands 3, Dauntless, and the like.

name: SilentHunt316
desc: SilentHunt316 enjoys playing a handful of games more in the FPS genre including COD: Modern Warfare, Realm Royale, Borderlands 3, Apex Legends, and the like

name: SirVegi
desc: SirVegi has been a huge supporter of TSG, is a variety streamer and enjoys playing games like Borderlands 3, Hades, VRChat, Boneworks, and the list continues...

name: TheDonChuckyy
desc: TheDonChuckyy is a huge supporter of TSG and has his own community called House Mafia. He enjoys playing many different games including Destiny 2, Madden NFL 20, Apex Legends, and more.

name: ToastyThaBrave
desc: ToastyThaBrave is a variety streamer that likes to play a ton of different games including...Dead by Daylight , House Flipper, Spellbreaker, and many more.
